adoptMandate((string,address,bytes,(uint.details: Can only be called through the protocol itself

assignRole(uint256,address).details: Can only be called through the protocol itself

params.account: The address to grant the role to
params.roleId: The identifier of the role to assign

blacklistAddress(address,bool).details: Can only be called through the protocol itself

params.blacklisted: The blacklisted status of the account

params.caller: The address attempting to call the mandate

returns._0: True if the caller has permission, false otherwise

cancel(uint16,bytes,uint256).details: the account to cancel must be the account that created the proposedAction.

params.mandateCalldata: The original encoded function call data

returns._0: The unique identifier of the cancelled proposal

params.actionId: The unique identifier of the proposal
params.support: The type of vote to cast

castVoteWithReason(uint256,uint8,string).details: Same as castVote but includes a reason string

params.actionId: The unique identifier of the proposal
params.reason: A human-readable explanation for the vote
params.support: The type of vote to cast

closeConstitute().details: Can only be called by an admin account

closeConstitute(address).details: Can only be called by an admin account

params.newAdmin: The address of the new admin account

constitute((string,address,bytes,(uint25.details: Can only be called once by an admin account

params.mandates: The list of mandate contracts to activate

params.maxCallDataLength_: maximum length of calldata for a mandate
params.maxExecutionsLength_: maximum length of executions for a mandate
params.maxReturnDataLength_: maximum length of return data for a mandate

fulfill(uint16,uint256,address[],uint256.details: Can only be called by an active mandate contract

params.actionId: The unique identifier of the action
params.calldatas: The list of encoded function calls
params.targets: The list of contract addresses to call
params.values: The list of ETH values to send with each call

params.actionId: The unique identifier of the action
The unique identifier of the proposal

returns.cancelledAt: - the block number at which the action was cancelled
returns.fulfilledAt: - the block number at which the action was fulfilled
returns.mandateId: - the id of the mandate that the action is associated with
returns.proposedAt: - the block number at which the action was proposed
returns.requestedAt: - the block number at which the action was requested

params.actionId: The unique identifier of the action
params.index: The index of the return data

returns.returnData: The return data for the action

params.actionId: The unique identifier of the proposal

returns._0: the current state of the proposal

params.actionId: The unique identifier of the action
The unique identifier of the proposal

returns.againstVotes: - the number of votes against the action
returns.forVotes: - the number of votes for the action
returns.voteDuration: - the duration of the voting period
returns.voteEnd: - the block number at which voting ends
returns.voteStart: - the block number at which voting starts

returns.active: The active status of the mandate

returns.latestFulfillment: The latest fulfillment of the mandate

getMandateCounter().details: Added this function to expose mandateCounter at IPowers interface level.

returns._0: The total number of adopted mandates

returns.quantityMandateActions: The quantity of actions of the mandate

params.index: The index of the role holder

returns.account: The address of the role holder

returns.since: the block number since holding the role, 0 if never held

params.actionId: The unique identifier of the proposal

returns._0: True if the account has voted, false otherwise
The blacklisted status of the account

labelRole(uint256,string).details: Optional. Can only be called through the protocol itself

params.label: The human-readable label for the role
params.roleId: The identifier of the role to label

propose(uint16,bytes,uint256,string).details: Only callable if the mandate requires voting (quorum > 0)note that no checks are run. If account has acces to mandate and it requires a vote - the account wil be able to create proposals.

params.mandateCalldata: The encoded function call data for the mandate
params.uriDescription: A human-readable description of the proposal

returns.actionId: The unique identifier of the created proposal

request(uint16,bytes,uint256,string).details: The request -> fulfill functions follow a call-and-return mechanism. This allows for async execution of mandates.

params.mandateCalldata: The encoded function call data for the mandate
params.uriDescription: A human-readable description of the action

revokeMandate(uint16).details: Can only be called through the protocol itself

revokeRole(uint256,address).details: Can only be called through the protocol itself

params.account: The address to remove the role from
params.roleId: The identifier of the role to remove

setTreasury(address).details: Can only be called through the protocol itself

setUri(string).details: Can only be called through the protocol itself

adoptMandate((string,address,bytes,(uint.notice: Activates a new mandate in the protocol

assignRole(uint256,address).notice: Grants a role to an account

canCallMandate(address,uint16).notice: Checks if an account has permission to call a mandate

castVote(uint256,uint8).notice: Casts a vote on an active proposal

castVoteWithReason(uint256,uint8,string).notice: Casts a vote on an active proposal with an explanation

closeConstitute().notice: Closes the constitute phase, preventing further mandates from being added

closeConstitute(address).notice: Closes the constitute phase, preventing further mandates from being added

constitute((string,address,bytes,(uint25.notice: Initializes the DAO by activating its founding mandates

constructor.notice: Sets the value for {name} at the time of construction.

fulfill(uint16,uint256,address[],uint256.notice: Completes an action by executing the actual calls

getActionCalldata(uint256).notice: Gets the calldata for a specific action

getActionData(uint256).notice: gets the data of an actionId that are not an array.

getActionReturnData(uint256,uint256).notice: Gets the return data for a specific action

getActionState(uint256).notice: Gets the current state of a proposal

getActionUri(uint256).notice: Gets the URI for a specific action

getActionVoteData(uint256).notice: gets the vote data of an actionId that are not an array.

getAdoptedMandate(uint16).notice: Checks if a mandate is currently active

getAmountRoleHolders(uint256).notice: Gets the total number of accounts holding a specific role

getConditions(uint16).notice: Gets the conditions of a mandate

getLatestFulfillment(uint16).notice: Gets the latest fulfillment of a mandate

getMandateActionAtIndex(uint16,uint256).notice: Gets the actions of a mandate

getMandateCounter().notice: Gets the total number of adopted mandates

getQuantityMandateActions(uint16).notice: Gets the quantity of actions of a mandate

getRoleHolderAtIndex(uint256,uint256).notice: Gets the holder of a role at a specific index

getRoleLabel(uint256).notice: Gets the label of a role

hasRoleSince(address,uint256).notice: Gets the block number since which an account has held a role

hasVoted(uint256,address).notice: Checks if an account has voted on a specific proposal

isBlacklisted(address).notice: Checks if an account is blacklisted

labelRole(uint256,string).notice: Assigns a human-readable label to a role

propose(uint16,bytes,uint256,string).notice: Creates a new proposal for an action that requires voting

request(uint16,bytes,uint256,string).notice: Initiates an action to be executed through a mandate

revokeRole(uint256,address).notice: Removes a role from an account

version().notice: saves the version of the Powersimplementation.
